original_text: For Heshbon was the city of Sihon the king of the Amorites, who had fought against the former king of Moab and taken all his land out of his hand, as far as the Arnon.
korean_text: 헤스본은 아모리인의 왕 시혼의 도성이라 시혼이 그 전 모압 왕을 치고 그의 모든 땅을 아르논까지 그의 손에서 빼앗았더라

sentences.original_text: For Heshbon was the city of Sihon the king of the Amorites
who had fought against the former king of Moab
and taken all his land out of his hand
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 손에서 그의 모든 땅을 빼앗았으며
